event.title: How to tumblr forgot password
event.description:
Tumblr may be a blogging platform that shares a large type of content. The most folding post types are text, photo, quote, link, chat, audio, and video. Tumblr users can follow one another within the same way as Twitter – posts from blogs you see appearing in your Tumblr dashboard. Once you Tumblr forgot password, you’ll lose access to all or any of your blogs including all of your memories. Worse is that each one of your followers is going to be missed. Fortunately, here you’ll find the answer to forgotten Tumblr password recovery.
If you’ve got forgotten the Tumblr password and need to reset it, it’s possible if you remember your email Id and its password. Read below to know-how –
Open your browser. Visit this link – https://www.tumblr.com/forgot_password
Enter your email address.
Verify that you are not a robot.
Click on the ‘Reset Password’ button next to it.
Now, in another tab, open your email.
Open the email received from the Tumblr backside.
You will be taken to the new website where you’ll reset your Tumblr password.
Now, enter the new password you would like to stay.
Click on the save button for the changes made.
